trans-unit.source: Provides the means to access and manage an in-process speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os meios para aceder e gerir um motor de reconhecimento de voz no processo.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar uma instância desta classe para qualquer um dos recognizers reconhecimento de voz instalada.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the static <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre os quais recognizers são instaladas, utilize a estática <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: This class is for running speech recognition engines in-process, and provides control over various aspects of speech recognition, as follows: - To create an in-process speech recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe destina-se em execução voz reconhecimento motores dentro do processo e fornece controlo sobre diferentes aspetos do reconhecimento de voz, da seguinte forma: - para criar um utilitário de reconhecimento de voz no processo, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>construtores.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To manage speech recognition grammars, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Para gerir gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>métodos e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure the input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para configurar a entrada para o reconhecedor, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To perform speech recognition, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para executar o reconhecimento de voz, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To modify how recognition handles silence or unexpected input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: -Para modificar a forma como o reconhecimento processa silêncio ou de entrada inesperada, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To change the number of alternates the recognizer returns, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Para alterar o número de alternates devolve o reconhecedor, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.MaxAlternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer returns recognition results in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor devolve resultados de reconhecimento num <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: - To synchronize changes to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -Para sincronizar as alterações para o reconhecedor, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses more than one thread to perform tasks.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor utiliza mais de um thread para realizar tarefas.

trans-unit.source: - To emulate input to the recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: -Para emular a entrada para o reconhecedor, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SpeechRecognitionEngine object is for the sole use of the process that instantiated the object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de SpeechRecognitionEngine é a utilização do processo de instanciar o objeto único.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> shares a single recognizer with any application that wants to use it.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>as partilhas de um único reconhecedor com qualquer aplicação que pretende utilizá-lo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>antes de libertar uma última referência para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the recognizer object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar serão não ser libertados até que o recoletor de lixo chama o objeto de utilitário `Finalize` método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for the system.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> utilizando o utilitário de reconhecimento de voz predefinido para o sistema de classe.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin speech recognition, you must load at least one recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz pode começar o reconhecimento de voz, tem pelo menos uma gramática de reconhecimento de carga e configurar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar uma gramática, chame o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a entrada de áudio, utilize um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class using the default speech recognizer for a specified locale.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe utilizando o utilitário de reconhecimento de voz predefinido para uma região especificada.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API de System.Speech aceitar todos os indicativos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `CultureInfo` argument, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento de voz utilizando o idioma especificado no `CultureInfo` argumento, um motor de reconhecimento de voz suporta tem de estar instalado indicativo de país de idioma.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Os motores de reconhecimento de voz vem incluído no Microsoft Windows 7 trabalham com os seguintes códigos de idioma país.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Reino Unido) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos) - Alemanha Alemanha.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Alemão (Datacenters) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Espanhol (Espanha) - fr FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Francês (França) - ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japonês (Japão) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma do chinês (Taiwan) de duas letras como "pt", "fr" ou "es" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz pode começar reconhecimento, tem de carregar a gramática de reconhecimento de voz, pelo menos, um e configurar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar uma gramática, chame o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a entrada de áudio, utilize um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The locale that the speech recognizer must support.
trans-unit.target: A região que o utilitário de reconhecimento de voz tem de suportar.

trans-unit.source: None of the installed speech recognizers support the specified locale, or culture is the invariant culture.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma das recognizers reconhecimento de voz instalada suporta a região especificada, ou culture é o idioma invariável.

trans-unit.source: Culture is .
trans-unit.target: Cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> using the information in a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> object to specify the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> utilizando as informações um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objeto para especificar o reconhecedor para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: You can create an instance of this class for any of the installed speech recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Pode criar uma instância desta classe para qualquer um dos recognizers reconhecimento de voz instalada.

trans-unit.source: To get information about which recognizers are installed, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre os quais recognizers são instaladas, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the speech recognizer can begin recognition, you must load at least one speech recognition grammar and configure the input for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz pode começar reconhecimento, tem de carregar a gramática de reconhecimento de voz, pelo menos, um e configurar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar uma gramática, chame o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a entrada de áudio, utilize um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The information for the specific speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: As informações para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz específico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class with a string parameter that specifies the name of the recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> classe com um parâmetro de cadeia que especifica o nome do reconhecedor para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: The token name of the recognizer is the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O nome do token do reconhecedor é o valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo>objecto devolvido pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>propriedade o reconhecedor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para obter uma coleção de todos os recognizers instalados, utilize a estática <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.target: Antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz pode começar reconhecimento, tem de carregar a gramática de reconhecimento de voz, pelo menos, um e configurar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: To load a grammar, call the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar uma gramática, chame o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.target: Para configurar a entrada de áudio, utilize um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The token name of the speech recognizer to use.
trans-unit.target: O nome do token do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz para utilizar.

trans-unit.source: No speech recognizer with that token name is installed, or recognizerId is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Está instalado qualquer reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz com esse nome do token, ou recognizerId é a cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: recognizerId is .
trans-unit.target: recognizerIdis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de áudio a ser recebido pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To configure the audio input, use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A>
trans-unit.target: Para configurar a entrada de áudio, utilize um dos seguintes métodos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A>- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveStream%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToWaveFile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToDefaultAudioDevice%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToAudioStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of audio at the input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the input is not configured or set to the null input.
trans-unit.target: O formato de áudio na entrada para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> instância, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a entrada não configurada ou não está definida para a entrada nulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the level of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nível de áudio a ser recebido pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value 0 represents silence, and 100 represents the maximum input volume.
trans-unit.target: O valor de 0 representa silêncio e 100 representa o volume de entrada máximo.

trans-unit.source: The audio level of the input to the speech recognizer, from 0 through 100.
trans-unit.target: O nível de áudio da entrada para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz, entre 0 e 100.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> reports the level of its audio input.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> reporta o nível da respetiva entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event multiple times per second.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>desencadeia este evento várias vezes por segundo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The frequency with which the event is raised depends on the computer on which the application is running.
trans-unit.target: A frequência com que o evento é gerado depende do computador no qual a aplicação é executada.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio level at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o nível de áudio no momento do evento, utilize a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs> associados</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio level of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o nível atual de áudio de entrada para o reconhecedor, utilize o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioLevelUpdated delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado AudioLevelUpdated, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location in the audio stream being generated by the device that is providing input to the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização atual na sequência de áudio a ser gerada pelo dispositivo que está a fornecer entrada para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioPosition property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AudioPosition faz referência a posição de entrada do dispositivo na sua sequência de áudio gerada.

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property references the recognizer's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>propriedade faz referência a posição do reconhecedor dentro do respetiva entrada de áudio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Estes posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> property is less than the value of the AudioPosition property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver recebido o reconhecedor de entrada para as quais tem não ainda gerado um resultado de reconhecimento, em seguida, o valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>propriedade é inferior ao valor da propriedade AudioPosition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current location in the audio stream being generated by the input device.
trans-unit.target: A localização atual na sequência de áudio gerada pelo dispositivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects a problem in the audio signal.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> Deteta um problema no sinal de áudio.

trans-unit.source: To get which problem occurred, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o problema ocorreu, utilize a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs> associados</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioSignalProblemOccurredEventArgs.AudioSignalProblem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioSignalProblemOccurred delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado AudioSignalProblemOccurred, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado de áudio a ser recebido pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AudioState property represents the audio state with a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AudioState representa o estado de áudio com um membro com o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumeração.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: The state of the audio input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O estado da entrada de áudio para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the state changes in the audio being received by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Desencadeado quando as alterações de estado do áudio a ser recebidos pelo <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get the audio state at the time of the event, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado de áudio no momento do evento, utilize a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs> associados</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioStateChangedEventArgs.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To get the current audio state of the input to the recognizer, use the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual de áudio de entrada para o reconhecedor, utilize o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioState%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about audio state, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o estado de áudio, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>enumeração.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioState>

trans-unit.source: When you create an AudioStateChanged delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado AudioStateChanged, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only background noise, before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o intervalo de tempo durante os quais um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> aceita entrada que contêm apenas em segundo plano ruído, antes de finalizar reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada utilitário de reconhecimento de voz tem um algoritmo para distinguir entre silêncio e de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer classifies as background noise any non-silence input that does not match the initial rule of any of the recognizer's loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor classifica como ruído de fundo qualquer não silêncio de entrada que não corresponde a regra inicial de qualquer um do reconhecedor carregados e ativados gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer receives only background noise and silence within the babble timeout interval, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor recebe apenas o ruído de fundo e silêncio dentro do intervalo de tempo limite babble, o reconhecedor finalizes essa operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Para operações de reconhecimento assíncrono, o reconhecedor gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>evento, onde o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `true`e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -Para operações de reconhecimento síncrona e emulação, devolve o reconhecedor `null`, em vez de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> válido

trans-unit.source: If the babble timeout period is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform a babble timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Se o período de tempo limite de babble estiver definido como 0, o reconhecedor não efetua uma verificação de tempo limite de babble.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo limite pode ser qualquer valor não negativo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0 segundos.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the time interval.
trans-unit.target: A duração do intervalo de tempo.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está definida como inferior a 0 segundos.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Disposes o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object and releases resources used during the session.
trans-unit.target: Disposes o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto e liberta recursos utilizados durante a sessão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: Emula a entrada de uma expressão para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz, utilizando o texto em vez de áudio para reconhecimento de voz síncronas.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: A gera do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos como se a operação de reconhecimento não está a ser emulada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case and character width when applying grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Recognizers que vêm com o Vista e Windows 7 Ignorar maiúsculas / minúsculas e caráter largura ao aplicar regras de gramática para a frase de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For more information about this type of comparison, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration values <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> and <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre este tipo de comparação, consulte a <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumeração valores <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>e <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizers also ignore new lines and extra white space and treat punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: Também os recognizers ignorar novas linhas e espaço em branco adicional e tratar pontuação como entrada literal.

trans-unit.source: The input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A entrada para a operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O resultado para a operação de reconhecimento, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a operação não é efetuada com êxito ou o reconhecedor não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não tem nenhum gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregadas.

trans-unit.source: inputText is .
trans-unit.target: inputTextis .

trans-unit.source: inputText is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: inputTexté a cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of specific words to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the words and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emula a entrada de palavras específicas para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz, utilizando o texto em vez de áudio para reconhecimento de voz síncrona e especifica a forma como o reconhecedor processa Unicode comparação entre as palavras e as gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregado.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.
trans-unit.target: A gera do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos como se a operação de reconhecimento não está a ser emulada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer uses `compareOptions` when it applies grammar rules to the input phrase.
trans-unit.target: Utiliza o reconhecedor `compareOptions` quando aplica-se as regras de gramática o frase de acesso de entrada.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.
trans-unit.target: Recognizers que vêm com o Vista e Windows 7 Ignorar maiúsculas / minúsculas se o <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>ou <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>valor está presente.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor sempre ignora a largura do caráter e nunca ignora o tipo de Kana.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor também ignora novas linhas e espaço em branco adicional e trata pontuação como entrada literal.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a largura do caráter e o tipo de Kana, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumeração.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: An array of word units that contains the input for the recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de unidades do word que contém a entrada para a operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the type of comparison to use for the emulated recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit dos valores da enumeração que descrevem o tipo de comparação a utilizar para a operação de reconhecimento emuladas.

trans-unit.source: The result for the recognition operation, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O resultado para a operação de reconhecimento, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a operação não é efetuada com êxito ou o reconhecedor não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer has no speech recognition grammars loaded.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não tem nenhum gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregadas.

trans-unit.source: wordUnits is .
trans-unit.target: wordUnitsis .

trans-unit.source: wordUnits contains one or more elements.
trans-unit.target: wordUnitscontém um ou mais elementos.

trans-unit.source: compareOptions contains the , , or flag.
trans-unit.target: compareOptionscontém o , , ou sinalizador.

trans-unit.source: Emulates input of a phrase to the speech recognizer, using text in place of audio for synchronous speech recognition, and specifies how the recognizer handles Unicode comparison between the phrase and the loaded speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: Emula a entrada de uma expressão para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz, utilizando o texto em vez de áudio para reconhecimento de voz síncrona e especifica a forma como o reconhecedor processa Unicode comparação entre o frase de acesso e as gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregado.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events as if the recognition operation is not emulated.

trans-unit.source: The recognizers that ship with Vista and Windows 7 ignore case if the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> or <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> value is present.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer always ignores the character width and never ignores the Kana type.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor sempre ignora a largura do caráter e nunca ignora o tipo de Kana.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer also ignores new lines and extra white space and treats punctuation as literal input.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor também ignora novas linhas e espaço em branco adicional e trata pontuação como entrada literal.

trans-unit.source: For more information about character width and Kana type, see the <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a largura do caráter e o tipo de Kana, consulte o <xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>enumeração.</xref:System.Globalization.CompareOptions>

trans-unit.source: compareOptions contains the , , or flag.
trans-unit.target: compareOptionscontém o , , ou sinalizador.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation of emulated input.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> finalizes uma operação assíncrona reconhecimento da entrada emulada.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> method begins an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>método começa uma operação assíncrona de reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event when it finalizes the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>desencadeia o evento de EmulateRecognizeCompleted quando finalizes-lo a operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> operation can raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>operação pode originar a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The EmulateRecognizeCompleted event is the last such event that the recognizer raises for a given operation.
trans-unit.target: O evento EmulateRecognizeCompleted é o último evento deste tipo que o reconhecedor desencadeia para uma operação indicada.

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was successful, you can access the recognition result using the either of the following: - The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object in the handler for the EmulateRecognizeCompleted event.
trans-unit.target: Se reconhecimento emulado foi bem sucedido, pode aceder o resultados de reconhecimento utilizando um dos seguintes: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objeto no processador para o evento EmulateRecognizeCompleted.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>objeto no processador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: If emulated recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event is not raised and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> will be null.
trans-unit.target: Se reconhecimento emulado não foi bem sucedido, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>o evento não é gerado e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>será nulo.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>deriva de <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>deriva de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When you create an EmulateRecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado EmulateRecognizeCompleted, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of unambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o intervalo de silêncio, que o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> aceitará no fim da entrada inequívoca antes de finalizar uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is unambiguous.
trans-unit.target: O utilitário de reconhecimento de voz utiliza este intervalo de tempo limite quando a entrada de reconhecimento é inequívoca.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para uma gramática de reconhecimento de voz que suporta o reconhecimento de um "novo jogos." ou "jogo novo", "novo, de jogos" for uma entrada inequívoca e "novo jogo" for uma entrada ambígua.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade determina o tempo durante o qual o motor de reconhecimento de voz irá aguardar entrada adicional antes de finalizar uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo limite pode ser de 0 segundos a 10 segundos, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: The default is 150 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 150 milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for ambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o intervalo de tempo limite para a entrada ambígua, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: A duração do intervalo de silêncio.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade estiver definida como inferior a 0 segundos ou superior a 10 segundos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of silence that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> will accept at the end of ambiguous input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o intervalo de silêncio, que o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> aceitará no fim da entrada ambígua antes de finalizar uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer uses this timeout interval when the recognition input is ambiguous.
trans-unit.target: O utilitário de reconhecimento de voz utiliza este intervalo de tempo limite quando a entrada de reconhecimento é ambígua.

trans-unit.source: For example, for a speech recognition grammar that supports recognition of either "new game please" or "new game", "new game please" is an unambiguous input, and "new game" is an ambiguous input.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para uma gramática de reconhecimento de voz que suporta o reconhecimento de um "novo jogos." ou "jogo novo", "novo, de jogos" for uma entrada inequívoca e "novo jogo" for uma entrada ambígua.

trans-unit.source: This property determines how long the speech recognition engine will wait for additional input before finalizing a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade determina o tempo durante o qual o motor de reconhecimento de voz irá aguardar entrada adicional antes de finalizar uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be from 0 seconds to 10 seconds, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo limite pode ser de 0 segundos a 10 segundos, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: The default is 500 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 500 milissegundos.

trans-unit.source: To set the timeout interval for unambiguous input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para definir o intervalo de tempo limite para a entrada inequívoca, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: A duração do intervalo de silêncio.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds or greater than 10 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade estiver definida como inferior a 0 segundos ou superior a 10 segundos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects that are loaded in this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objetos que são carregados deste <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time interval during which a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o intervalo de tempo durante os quais um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> aceita entrado silêncio apenas contentora antes de finalizar reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada utilitário de reconhecimento de voz tem um algoritmo para distinguir entre silêncio e de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer input is silence during the initial silence timeout period, then the recognizer finalizes that recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Se a entrada do reconhecedor é silêncio durante o período de tempo limite de silêncio inicial, o reconhecedor finalizes essa operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: - For asynchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, where the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `null`.
trans-unit.target: -Para operações de reconhecimento assíncrono e emulação, gera o reconhecedor o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>evento, onde o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `true`e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: - For synchronous recognition operations and emulation, the recognizer returns `null`, instead of a valid <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.
trans-unit.target: -Para operações de reconhecimento síncrona e emulação, devolve o reconhecedor `null`, em vez de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> válido

trans-unit.source: If the initial silence timeout interval is set to 0, the recognizer does not perform an initial silence timeout check.
trans-unit.target: Se o intervalo de tempo limite de silêncio inicial está definido como 0, o reconhecedor não efetua uma verificação de tempo limite de silêncio inicial.

trans-unit.source: The timeout interval can be any non-negative value.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo limite pode ser qualquer valor não negativo.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é 0 segundos.

trans-unit.source: The duration of the interval of silence.
trans-unit.target: A duração do intervalo de silêncio.

trans-unit.source: This property is set to less than 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade está definida como inferior a 0 segundos.

trans-unit.source: Returns information for all of the installed speech recognizers on the current system.
trans-unit.target: Devolve informações para todas as recognizers de reconhecimento de voz instalada no sistema atual.

trans-unit.source: To get information about the current recognizer, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre o reconhecedor atual, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"></xref> objects that describe the installed recognizers.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção só de leitura do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerInfo"> </xref> objetos que descrevem os recognizers instalados.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously loads a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Em sincronia carrega um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor emite uma exceção se a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto já está carregado, está a ser carregado no modo assíncrono ou não conseguiu carregar para qualquer reconhecedor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You cannot load the same <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object into multiple instances of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível carregar o mesmo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto em várias instâncias do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Instead, create a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object for each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, crie um novo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto para cada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor estiver a executar, as aplicações têm de utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para colocar em pausa o motor de reconhecimento de voz antes de carregar, o descarregamento, ativar ou desativar uma gramática.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Quando carregar uma gramática, está ativada por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para desativar uma gramática carregada, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To load a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Carregar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto de forma assíncrona, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.target: O objeto de gramática para carregar.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer throws an exception if the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object is already loaded, is being asynchronously loaded, or has failed to load into any recognizer.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor estiver a executar, as aplicações têm de utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para colocar em pausa o motor de reconhecimento de voz antes de carregar, o descarregamento, ativar ou desativar uma gramática.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you load a grammar, it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: Quando carregar uma gramática, está ativada por predefinição.

trans-unit.source: To disable a loaded grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para desativar uma gramática carregada, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>método inicia uma operação assíncrona.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarAsync%2A>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>desencadeia este evento quando concluir a operação.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To get the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that the recognizer loaded, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto que o reconhecedor carregado, utilize a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs> associados</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>
