trans-unit.target: Para obter atual <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos carregou o reconhecedor, utilize o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Grammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the speech recognition engine before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a grammar.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor estiver a executar, as aplicações têm de utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para colocar em pausa o motor de reconhecimento de voz antes de carregar, o descarregamento, ativar ou desativar uma gramática.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a LoadGrammarCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado LoadGrammarCompleted, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of alternate recognition results that the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> returns for each recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o número máximo de resultados de reconhecimento alternativa que o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> devolve para cada operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> class contains the collection of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> objects that represent possible interpretations of the input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>classe contém a coleção de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>objetos que representam possíveis interpretações da entrada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for MaxAlternates is 10.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido para MaxAlternates é 10.

trans-unit.source: The number of alternate results to return.
trans-unit.target: O número de resultados alternativos a devolver.

trans-unit.source: MaxAlternates is set to a value less than 0.
trans-unit.target: MaxAlternates está definido para um valor inferior a 0.

trans-unit.source: Returns the values of settings for the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Devolve os valores das definições para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: Recognizer settings can contain string, 64-bit integer, or memory address data.
trans-unit.target: Definições do reconhecedor podem conter cadeia, número inteiro de 64 bits ou dados de endereço de memória.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the settings that are defined for a Microsoft Speech API (SAPI)-compliant recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte descreve as definições que são definidas para uma API de reconhecimento de voz do Microsoft (SAPI)-reconhecedor em conformidade.

trans-unit.source: The following settings must have the same range for each recognizer that supports the setting.
trans-unit.target: As seguintes definições tem de ter o mesmo intervalo de tempo para cada reconhecedor que suporta a definição.

trans-unit.source: A SAPI-compliant recognizer is not required to support these settings and can support other settings.
trans-unit.target: Um em conformidade SAPI reconhecedor não é necessário para suportar estas definições e pode suportar outras definições.

trans-unit.source: |Name|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`ResourceUsage`|Specifies the recognizer's CPU consumption.
trans-unit.target: | Nome | Descrição | |----------|-----------------| | `ResourceUsage`| Especifica o consumo da CPU o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 100.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo é de 0 a 100.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 50.| |`ResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of unambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é 50. | | `ResponseSpeed`| Indica o período de silêncio no fim da entrada inequívoca antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz concluída uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000 milliseconds (ms).
trans-unit.target: O intervalo é de 0 a 10 000 milissegundos (ms).

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta definição corresponde o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 150ms.| |`ComplexResponseSpeed`|Indicates the length of silence at the end of ambiguous input before the speech recognizer completes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Predefinição = 150ms. | | `ComplexResponseSpeed`| Indica o período de silêncio no fim da entrada ambígua antes do utilitário de reconhecimento de voz concluída uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0 to 10,000ms.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo é de 0 a 10,000ms.

trans-unit.source: This setting corresponds to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esta definição corresponde o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: Default = 500ms.| |`AdaptationOn`|Indicates whether adaptation of the acoustic model is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`).
trans-unit.target: Predefinição = 500ms. | | `AdaptationOn`| Indica se adaptation do modelo de acústica está ON (valor = `1`) ou OFF (valor = `0`).

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| |`PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`|Indicates whether background adaptation is ON (value = `1`) or OFF (value = `0`), and persists the setting in the registry.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `1` (ON). | | `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`| Indica se adaptation em segundo plano está ON (valor = `1`) ou OFF (valor = `0`), e persistir a definição no registo.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `1` (ON).| To update a setting for the recognizer, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é `1` (ON). | Para atualizar uma definição para o reconhecedor, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to return.
trans-unit.target: O nome da definição de para devolver.

trans-unit.source: The value of the setting.
trans-unit.target: O valor da definição.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameé a cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não tem uma definição com este nome.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação de reconhecimento de voz síncronas.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Este método executa uma operação de reconhecimento único.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs this operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor executa esta operação em relação a respetivas gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregados e ativados.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para este método, o reconhecedor pode aumentar os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor Deteta entrada poderá identificar como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando a entrada cria uma correspondência ambígua com um dos gramáticas Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor finalizes uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not raise the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event when using this method.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não elevar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>eventos ao utilizar este método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The Recognize method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.
trans-unit.target: O método Recognize devolve um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objeto, ou `null` se a operação não for bem sucedida.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: A synchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode efetuar uma operação síncrona reconhecimento pelas seguintes razões:-reconhecimento de voz não for detetado antes dos intervalos de tempo limite expirarem para a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -O motor de reconhecimento Deteta voz mas não localiza nenhum correspondências em qualquer uma das respetivas carregá-la e ativado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform asynchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento assíncrono, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de reconhecimento de entrada, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a operação não é efetuada com êxito ou o reconhecedor não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: Performs a synchronous speech recognition operation with a specified initial silence timeout period.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação de reconhecimento de voz síncrono com um período de tempo limite especificado de silêncio inicial.

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine detects speech within the time interval specified by `initialSilenceTimeout` argument, Recognize performs a single recognition operation and then terminates.
trans-unit.target: Se o motor de reconhecimento de voz Deteta o reconhecimento de voz no intervalo de tempo especificado pelo `initialSilenceTimeout` argumento, Recognize efetua uma operação de reconhecimento único e, em seguida, termina.

trans-unit.source: The `initialSilenceTimeout` parameter supersedes the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O `initialSilenceTimeout` parâmetro substitui o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para este método, o reconhecedor pode aumentar os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor Deteta entrada poderá identificar como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando a entrada cria uma correspondência ambígua com um dos gramáticas Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize> method returns a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object, or `null` if the operation is not successful.

trans-unit.target: Pode efetuar uma operação síncrona reconhecimento pelas seguintes razões:-reconhecimento de voz não for detetado antes dos intervalos de tempo limite expirarem para a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>ou para o `initialSilenceTimeout` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform asynchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento assíncrono, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: The interval of time a speech recognizer accepts input containing only silence before finalizing recognition.
trans-unit.target: O intervalo de tempo que aceita um utilitário de reconhecimento de voz de entrada que contenham apenas silêncio antes de finalizar reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The recognition result for the input, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the operation is not successful or the recognizer is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: O resultado de reconhecimento de entrada, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se a operação não é efetuada com êxito ou o reconhecedor não está ativado.

trans-unit.source: Performs a single, asynchronous speech recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma operação de reconhecimento de voz única e assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a single, asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: Este método executa uma operação única e assíncrona reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer performs the operation against its loaded and enabled speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor efetua a operação na respetivas gramáticas de reconhecimento de voz carregados e ativados.

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para este método, o reconhecedor pode aumentar os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor Deteta entrada poderá identificar como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.source: Raised when input creates an ambiguous match with one of the active grammars.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando a entrada cria uma correspondência ambígua com um dos gramáticas Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor finalizes uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>operação depois de concluída.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o resultado de uma operação assíncrona reconhecimento, anexar um processador de eventos para o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor desencadeia este evento sempre que for concluída com êxito uma operação assíncrona ou síncrona reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecimento não foi bem sucedido, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objeto, que pode aceder ao processador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>eventos, será `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento síncrono, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Performs one or more asynchronous speech recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Executa uma ou mais operações de reconhecimento de voz assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: If `mode` is <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, the recognizer continues performing asynchronous recognition operations until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Se `mode` é <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>, o reconhecedor continua a efetuar operações de reconhecimento assíncrona até o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>método é chamado.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeMode>

trans-unit.source: During a call to this method, the recognizer can raise the following events: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.
trans-unit.target: Durante uma chamada para este método, o reconhecedor pode aumentar os seguintes eventos:- <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechDetected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor Deteta entrada poderá identificar como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>

trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando a entrada cria uma correspondência ambígua com um dos gramáticas Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the recognizer finalizes a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o reconhecedor finalizes uma operação de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>operação depois de concluída.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the result of an asynchronous recognition operation, attach an event handler to the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o resultado de uma operação assíncrona reconhecimento, anexar um processador de eventos para o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event whenever it successfully completes a synchronous or asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor desencadeia este evento sempre que for concluída com êxito uma operação assíncrona ou síncrona reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object, which you can access in the handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> event, will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecimento não foi bem sucedido, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objeto, que pode aceder ao processador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>eventos, será `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous recognition operation can fail for the following reasons: - Speech is not detected before the timeout intervals expire for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode efetuar uma operação assíncrona reconhecimento pelas seguintes razões:-reconhecimento de voz não for detetado antes dos intervalos de tempo limite expirarem para a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The recognition engine detects speech but finds no matches in any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: -O motor de reconhecimento Deteta voz mas não localiza nenhum correspondências em qualquer uma das respetivas carregá-la e ativado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To perform synchronous recognition, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento síncrono, utilize um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to perform one or multiple recognition operations.
trans-unit.target: Indica se deve efetuar uma ou várias operações de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: Terminates asynchronous recognition without waiting for the current recognition operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: Termina o reconhecimento assíncrono sem aguardar a conclusão da operação reconhecimento atual.

trans-unit.source: This method immediately finalizes asynchronous recognition.
trans-unit.target: Este método imediatamente finalizes reconhecimento assíncrono.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the input is truncated and the operation completes with the existing input.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação assíncrona reconhecimento atual está a receber entrada, a entrada é truncada e a conclusão da operação com a entrada existente.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is canceled, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Gera o reconhecedor o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>evento quando uma operação assíncrona foi cancelada e define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>para `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method cancels asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Este método cancela assíncronas operações iniciadas pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To stop asynchronous recognition without truncating the input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para parar o reconhecimento assíncrono sem truncar a entrada, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncStop%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stops asynchronous recognition after the current recognition operation completes.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe o reconhecimento assíncrono depois de concluída a operação de reconhecimento atual.

trans-unit.source: This method finalizes asynchronous recognition without truncating input.
trans-unit.target: Este método finalizes reconhecimento assíncrono sem truncar entrada.

trans-unit.source: If the current asynchronous recognition operation is receiving input, the recognizer continues accepting input until the current recognition operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: Se a operação assíncrona reconhecimento atual estiver a receber entrada, o reconhecedor continua a aceitar entrada até a operação de reconhecimento atual está concluída.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event when an asynchronous operation is stopped, and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Gera o reconhecedor o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>evento quando uma operação assíncrona está parada e define o <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>para `true`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>

trans-unit.source: This method stops asynchronous operations initiated by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Este método deixa de operações assíncronas iniciadas pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: To immediately cancel asynchronous recognition with only the existing input, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para cancelar imediatamente reconhecimento assíncrono com apenas a entrada existente, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> finalizes an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> finalizes uma operação assíncrona de reconhecimento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> method initiates an asynchronous recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>do objeto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>método inicia uma operação assíncrona de reconhecimento.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer finalizes the asynchronous operation, it raises this event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor finalizes a operação assíncrona, desencadeia este evento.

trans-unit.source: Using the handler for the RecognizeCompleted event, you can access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizando o processador para o evento RecognizeCompleted, pode aceder a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: If recognition was not successful, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecimento não foi bem sucedido, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>será `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a timeout or an interruption in audio input caused recognition to fail, you can access the properties for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar se um tempo limite ou uma interrupção na entrada de áudio causada reconhecimento falhar, pode aceder às propriedades para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InputStreamEnded%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs> class for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>classe para obter mais informações.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizeCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To obtain details on the best rejected recognition candidates, attach a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre os melhores candidatos de reconhecimento rejeitadas, anexar um processador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizeCompleted delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado RecognizeCompleted, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current location of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a localização atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> na entrada de áudio que estiver a processar.

trans-unit.source: The audio position is specific to each speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: A posição de áudio é específica para cada utilitário de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: The zero value of an input stream is established when it is enabled.
trans-unit.target: O valor zero de um fluxo de entrada é estabelecido quando este está ativado.

trans-unit.source: The RecognizerAudioPosition property references the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object's position within its audio input.
trans-unit.target: As referências de propriedade RecognizerAudioPosition o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>posição do objeto a entrada de áudio.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: By contrast, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property references the input device's position in its generated audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Por outro lado, a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>propriedade faz referência a posição de entrada do dispositivo na sua sequência de áudio gerada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: These positions can be different.
trans-unit.target: Estes posições podem ser diferentes.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the recognizer has received input for which it has not yet generated a recognition result then the value of the RecognizerAudioPosition property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se tiver recebido o reconhecedor de entrada para as quais tem não ainda gerado um resultado de reconhecimento, em seguida, o valor da propriedade RecognizerAudioPosition é inferior ao valor da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position of the recognizer in the audio input that it is processing.
trans-unit.target: A posição do reconhecedor na entrada de áudio que estiver a processar.

trans-unit.source: Gets information about the current instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém informações sobre a instância atual do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To get information about all of the installed speech recognizers for the current system, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre todas as recognizers de reconhecimento de voz instalado para o sistema atual, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InstalledRecognizers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Information about the current speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Informações sobre o utilitário de reconhecimento de voz atual.

trans-unit.source: Raised when a running <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> pauses to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: Desencadeado quando uma execução <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> coloca em pausa para aceitar as modificações.

trans-unit.source: Applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause a running instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> before modifying its settings or its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: As aplicações têm de utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para colocar em pausa uma instância em execução de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>antes de modificar as definições ou respetivas <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises this event when it is ready to accept modifications.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>desencadeia este evento quando estiver pronto para aceitar as modificações.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For example, while the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> is paused, you can load, unload, enable, and disable <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, and modify values for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, enquanto o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>é colocada em pausa, pode carregar, descarregar, ativar e desativar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos e modificar os valores para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a RecognizerUpdateReached delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado RecognizerUpdateReached, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state.
trans-unit.target: Pedidos de que o reconhecedor interrompe para atualizar o seu estado.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>é `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To provide a user token, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para fornecer um token de utilizador, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um desvio igual a posição de áudio, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Pedidos de que o reconhecedor interrompe para atualizar o estado e fornece um token de utilizador para o evento associado.

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>contém o valor do `userToken` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: To specify an audio position offset, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar um desvio igual a posição de áudio, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Informações definido pelo utilizador que contenha informações sobre a operação.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the recognizer pauses to update its state and provides an offset and a user token for the associated event.
trans-unit.target: Pedidos de que o reconhecedor interrompe para atualizar o estado e fornece um desvio e um token de utilizador para o evento associado.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not initiate the recognizer update request until the recognizer's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A> equals the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não iniciará o pedido de actualização do reconhecedor até o reconhecedor <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>é igual a atual <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A>plus `audioPositionAheadToRaiseUpdate`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerAudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer generates the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached> event, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> contains the value of the `userToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>evento, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs>contém o valor do `userToken` parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizerUpdateReachedEventArgs.UserToken%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizerUpdateReached>

trans-unit.source: User-defined information that contains information for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Informações definido pelo utilizador que contenha informações sobre a operação.

trans-unit.source: The offset from the current <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*> to delay the request.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento da atual <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>para atrasar o pedido.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioPosition*>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from an audio stream.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto para receber a entrada de uma sequência de áudio.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor chega ao fim do fluxo de entrada durante uma operação de reconhecimento, a operação de reconhecimento finalizes com a entrada disponível.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer operações subsequentes reconhecimento podem gerar uma exceção, a menos que atualizar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: The audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo de entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: The format of the audio input.
trans-unit.target: O formato da entrada de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from the default audio device.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto para receber a entrada do dispositivo de áudio predefinido.

trans-unit.source: Disables the input to the speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Desativa a entrada para o reconhecedor de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Configure the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object for no input when using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods, or when taking a recognition engine temporarily off line.
trans-unit.target: Configurar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objeto para nenhuma entrada quando utilizar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos, ou ao colocar um motor de reconhecimento temporariamente offline.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a Waveform audio format (.wav) file.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto para receber a entrada de um ficheiro de formato de áudio (wav) Waveform.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input file during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor atingir o fim do ficheiro de entrada durante uma operação de reconhecimento, a operação de reconhecimento finalizes com a entrada disponível.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer operações subsequentes reconhecimento podem gerar uma exceção, a menos que atualizar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to use as input.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do ficheiro para utilizar como entrada.

trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object to receive input from a stream that contains Waveform audio format (.wav) data.
trans-unit.target: Configura o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objeto para receber a entrada de um fluxo que contém dados de formato de áudio (wav) Waveform.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer reaches the end of the input stream during a recognition operation, the recognition operation finalizes with the available input.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor chega ao fim do fluxo de entrada durante uma operação de reconhecimento, a operação de reconhecimento finalizes com a entrada disponível.

trans-unit.source: Any subsequent recognition operations can generate an exception, unless you update the input to the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer operações subsequentes reconhecimento podem gerar uma exceção, a menos que atualizar a entrada para o reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: The stream containing the audio data.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo que contém os dados de áudio.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> detects input that it can identify as speech.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> Deteta entrada poderá identificar como reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: Each speech recognizer has an algorithm to distinguish between silence and speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada utilitário de reconhecimento de voz tem um algoritmo para distinguir entre silêncio e de reconhecimento de voz.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> performs a speech recognition operation, it raises the SpeechDetected event when its algorithm identifies the input as speech.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>efetua uma operação de reconhecimento de voz, gera o evento de SpeechDetected ao respetivo algoritmo identifica a entrada como reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> object indicates location in the input stream where the recognizer detected speech.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>propriedade associada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs>objeto indica a localização no fluxo de entrada onde o reconhecedor detetar o reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechDetectedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> raises the SpeechDetected event before it raises any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>desencadeia o evento de SpeechDetected antes de qualquer um dos gera o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognitionRejected> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechHypothesized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechDetected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado SpeechDetected, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> has recognized a word or words that may be a component of multiple complete phrases in a grammar.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> tem reconhecido uma palavra ou palavras que podem ser um componente de várias expressões concluídas uma gramática.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> generates numerous SpeechHypothesized events as it attempts to identify an input phrase.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>gera vários eventos SpeechHypothesized como tenta identificar uma expressão de entrada.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can access the text of partially recognized phrases in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> object in the handler for the SpeechHypothesized event.
trans-unit.target: Pode aceder ao texto das expressões parcialmente reconhecidos no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>objeto no processador para o evento SpeechHypothesized.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, handling these events is useful only for debugging.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, processamento estes eventos só é útil para depuração.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs> derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>deriva de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs></xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechHypothesizedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> property and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechHypothesized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado SpeechHypothesized, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
