trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that does not match any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> recebe entrada que não corresponde a qualquer uma das respetivas carregá-la e ativada <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises this event if it determines that input does not match with sufficient confidence any of its loaded and enabled <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor desencadeia este evento se determina que entrada não corresponde com confiança suficiente qualquer uma das respetivas carregá-la e ativada <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the rejected <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>contém o rejeitadas <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the handler for the SpeechRecognitionRejected event to retrieve recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> that were rejected and their <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> scores.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o processador para o evento SpeechRecognitionRejected obter reconhecimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>que foram rejeitados e os respetivos <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A>pontuações.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Confidence%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação estiver a utilizar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instância, pode modificar o nível de confiança no qual voz entrada seja aceite ou rejeitada com um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a forma como o reconhecimento de voz responde a não entrada utilizando voz o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognitionRejected delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado SpeechRecognitionRejected, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> receives input that matches any of its loaded and enabled <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: É desencadeado quando o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> recebe entrada que corresponde a qualquer uma das respetivas carregá-la e ativada <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: You can initiate a recognition operation using the one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Pode iniciar uma operação de reconhecimento utilizando um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>ou <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.Recognize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The recognizer raises the SpeechRecognized event if it determines that input matches one of its loaded <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects with a sufficient level of confidence to constitute recognition.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor desencadeia o evento SpeechRecognized se determina que entrada corresponde a uma das respetivas carregá-la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos com um nível de confiança para constituem reconhecimento suficiente.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> contains the accepted <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs>contém o aceite <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionRejectedEventArgs> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handlers of SpeechRecognized events can obtain the recognized phrase as well as a list of recognition <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> with lower confidence scores.
trans-unit.target: Os processadores de eventos de SpeechRecognized podem obter o frase reconhecido, bem como uma lista de reconhecimento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>com inferiores pontuações de confiança.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance, you can modify the confidence level at which speech input is accepted or rejected with one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Se a aplicação estiver a utilizar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instância, pode modificar o nível de confiança no qual voz entrada seja aceite ou rejeitada com um do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: You can modify how the speech recognition responds to non-speech input using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode modificar a forma como o reconhecimento de voz responde a não entrada utilizando voz o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeoutAmbiguous%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EndSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.InitialSilenceTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.BabbleTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the recognizer receives input that matches a grammar, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object can raise its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando o reconhecedor recebe entrada que corresponde a uma gramática a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto pode aumentar o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>do objeto <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>o evento é gerado antes do evento SpeechRecognized o utilitário de reconhecimento de voz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be performed by a handler for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event.
trans-unit.target: Todas as tarefas específicas para uma determinado gramática devem sempre ser efetuadas por um processador para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: When you create a SpeechRecognized delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado SpeechRecognized, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Events and Delegates](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [eventos e delegados](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=162418).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Unloads all <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> objects from the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Efetua a descarga de todos os <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objetos a partir do reconhecedor.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is currently loading a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> asynchronously, this method waits until the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> is loaded, before it unloads all of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor está atualmente a carregar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>no modo assíncrono, este método tem de aguardar até o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>é carregado, antes de que efetua a descarga todas a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To unload a specific grammar, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao descarregar uma gramática específica, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadGrammar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unloads a specified <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Efetua a descarga uma determinada <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> de objeto do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer is running, applications must use <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A> to pause the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> instance before loading, unloading, enabling, or disabling a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Se o reconhecedor estiver a executar, as aplicações têm de utilizar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>para colocar em pausa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>instância antes de carregar, o descarregamento, ativar ou desativar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RequestRecognizerUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To unload all <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ao descarregar a todos os <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objetos, utilize o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A>método.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UnloadAllGrammars%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The grammar object to unload.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de gramática ao descarregar.

trans-unit.source: Grammar is .
trans-unit.target: Grammaris .

trans-unit.source: The grammar is not loaded in this recognizer, or this recognizer is currently loading the grammar asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: A gramática não está carregada neste reconhecedor ou neste reconhecedor está atualmente carregar a gramática de forma assíncrona.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified setting for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> with the specified integer value.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a definição especificada para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> com o valor de número inteiro especificado.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Com exceção do `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, os valores de propriedade definidos utilizando o método UpdateRecognizerSetting permanecem em vigor apenas para a instância atual do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, após o qual estes reverter para as respetivas predefinições.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>para obter descrições de definições suportadas.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: O nome da definição de atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a definição.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameé a cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não tem uma definição com este nome.

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified speech recognition engine setting with the specified string value.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a definição de motor de reconhecimento de voz especificado com o valor de cadeia especificada.

trans-unit.source: With the exception of `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, property values set using the UpdateRecognizerSetting method remain in effect only for the current instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, after which they revert to their default settings.
trans-unit.target: Com exceção do `PersistedBackgroundAdaptation`, os valores de propriedade definidos utilizando o método UpdateRecognizerSetting permanecem em vigor apenas para a instância atual do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>, após o qual estes reverter para as respetivas predefinições.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A> for descriptions of supported settings.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>para obter descrições de definições suportadas.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.UpdateRecognizerSetting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the setting to update.
trans-unit.target: O nome da definição de atualizar.

trans-unit.source: The new value for the setting.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor para a definição.

trans-unit.source: settingName is .
trans-unit.target: settingNameis .

trans-unit.source: settingName is the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: settingNameé a cadeia vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: The recognizer does not have a setting by that name.
trans-unit.target: O reconhecedor não tem uma definição com este nome.
